name: Open Tower Defense 🗼
description:
A unique spin on the tower defense genre.

  • Every wave your play area expands as you discover more of the world.
  • Enemies will come from various locations around you.
  • Expand your base in order to build more towers.
  • Unlock new buildings as you go.
  • Every 10 waves exceptionally strong enemies will appear.
  • The game is over when your base is destroyed or the entire map is discovered.
